short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A web design tool based on iDraw.js

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A free design tool based on iDraw.js, similar to Figma and Sketch, focusing on the design of web pages and pictures. Offline first, the data is stored in the browser's local cache, and it supports exporting offline files, pictures or JSON data.
